grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 概念【ガイネン】general idea, concept, notion
概算【ガイサン】approximation, rough estimate
気概【キガイ】strong spirit, mettle, backbone, guts, fighting spirit
梗概【コウガイ】outline, summary, epitome
kun reading compounds: 概ね【おおむね】in general, generally, mostly, roughly, largely, mainly, on the whole, by and large, gist, point, main idea
